CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Monthly') , 1000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Monthly') , 2000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Monthly') , 3000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Quarterly') , 3000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Quarterly') , 4000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Quarterly') , 6000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Silver')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Annual') , 7000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Gold')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Annual') , 9000, IF( ISPICKVAL( Membership_Plan__c , 'Platinum')&&ISPICKVAL( Subscription_Type__c , 'Annual') , 12000, 0 )))))))))
CustomField.label: Amount
